name: Facial Emotion Recognition
desc: Developed a Facial Emotion Recognition System using Convolutional Neural Networks to detect and interpret human emotions based on facial expressions.

name: Chat Messanger with log Facility
desc: A peer-to-peer chat application using Java socket programming that enables text communication with periodic logging, compatible across platforms.

name: Customized Virtual File System
desc: A customized virtual file system project that replicates Linux file system functionalities with essential data structures and shell-based interaction across platforms.

name: Calculator
desc: Created a simple calculator in Java to perform basic arithmetic operations like addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division using GUI.

name: File Packer and Unpacker
desc: Developed a Java-based File Packer and Unpacker tool to combine multiple files into a single file and extract them back efficiently for easy storage and transfer.
